price: Atau apakah bagi mereka kerajaan langit dan bumi dan yang ada di antara keduanya? (Jika ada), maka hendaklah mereka menaiki tangga-tangga (ke langit).
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُم مُّلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَاۖ فَلۡيَرۡتَقُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَسۡبَٰبِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am lahum mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā falyartaqū fī al-asbābi
